DOC.brief_summary: This study aim randomly assign individual type 2 diabetes ENHANCED randomize control trial . The study conduct Minneapolis Heart Institute Foundation ( MHIF ) two study site 1 ) Hutchinson Health 2 ) New Ulm Medical Center . The study primarily fund Academy Nutrition Dietetics ( AND ) . The study examine impact register dietitian-led , primary care integrate , telemedicine program diabetes care measure ( 'D5 ' ) one year compare usual care . The D5 goal include : blood pressure < 140/90 mmHg , take statin appropriate , A1c < 8 % , use tobacco take aspirin appropriate .
DOC.brief_title: diEtitiaNs Helping pAtieNts CarE Diabetes ( ENHANCED )
DOC.detailed_description: Individuals invite attend baseline visit lab work do , anthropometrics ( height , weight , waist circumference ) complete lifestyle assessment . They formally consent participation signing study consent form . The measure collect completion one year study . Study participant receive two session free lab work , diabetes education book , brief coaching register dietitian/certified diabetes educator . In addition , randomize phone coach access register dietitian/certified diabetes educator monthly basis one year personalize health coach free . The intent coaching help individual achieve diabetes `` optimal '' care meet 5 Diabetes Care measure ( blood glucose , blood pressure , tobacco use , statin aspirin use ) . This program design complement usual clinic-based primary care , coach document lab , biometrics medication adjustment EHR , along document phone encounter communicate directly patient ' PCPs need . Documentation EHR use order create specifically study indicate patient 's research status . Lab work require part research study baseline 12 month cover study . Any lab work and/or medication co-pays fee outside baseline 12 month study visit responsibility patient and/or insurance
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis Type 2 Diabetes 2 . Individuals meet 3 D5 goal , 3 . Have visit provider within last 2 year 1 . Type 1 Diabetes 2 . Chronic kidney disease ( GFR < 30 ) 3 . HIV 4 . Institutional residence 5 . Major cognitive language barrier ( determined program enrollment staff ) 6 . Other active endstage disease ( e.g. , late stage cancer pulmonary disease ) 7 . Actively receive cancer treatment 8 . Pregnant
